newsitem.title: USA: Continental Investment grants CEO option.
newsitem.headline: Continental Investment grants CEO option.

text.p: Continental Investment Corp Friday said it has granted its Chariman and Chief Executive, R. Dale Sterritt, an option to purchase 250,000 shrares of Continental common stock at an exercise price of $100 per share.
Continental's stock closed yesterday at $21-1/4 per share.
Continental's President, Thomas Snodgrass, said, "The option was granted in light of Dale Sterritt's superb management and as an incentive for him to keep up the good work."
Continental owns a 229 acre undeveloped tract of land within the city limits of Atlanta, Georgia, which it hopes to use as a waste disposal and recycling facility.
